greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: XOR BINOMIAL transform of A101119.
comment: Nonzero terms form A101121 and occur at positions 2^k for k >= 0. A101119 equals the nonzero differences of A006519 and A003484. See A099884 for the definition of the XOR BINOMIAL transform.
formula: a(n) = SumXOR_{k=0..n} (C(n, k) mod 2)*A101119(k), where SumXOR is summation under XOR. A101119(n) = SumXOR_{k=0..n} (C(n, k) mod 2)*a(k). a(2^(n-1)) = A101121(n) for n >= 1 and a(k)=0 when k is not a power of 2.
results.author: _Simon Plouffe_ and _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 02 2004
